Module name: FileList

Description: Class

Other notes:

Note: The class checks the Options flag, but
the StartDir function does not check to see
if NonModalAllowed for the busy dialog box.

Progress

TakeBreaks PublicPublic Property Let TakeBreaks(ByVal pVal As Boolean)
Determines if DoEvents() should be raised. Changes the Options flag.

StartDir PublicPublic Function StartDir(ByVal Find As String) As LongExit Function
Path supports the use of multiple character (*) and single character (?) wildcards to specify multiple files.

Pathname PublicPublic Property Get Pathname() As String
Returns formatted pathname with backslash.

FolderItem PublicPublic Property Get FolderItem(ByVal Index As Long) As String
One-based index.

FolderCount PublicPublic Property Get FolderCount() As Long
Count of folders accessed using FolderItem().

FolderCol PublicPublic Property Get FolderCol() As CollectionString
Returns collection for Visual Basic.

Finished PublicPublic Sub Finished()'/// Call this function to close the Busy dialog box when the conFileListBusyDialogBox flag is set.
Call this function to close the Busy dialog box when the conFileListBusyDialogBox flag is set.

FileItem PublicPublic Property Get FileItem(ByVal Index As Long) As String
One-based index.

FileCount PublicPublic Property Get FileCount() As Long
Count of files accessed using FileItem().

FileCol PublicPublic Property Get FileCol() As CollectionString
Returns collection for Visual Basic.

DoBusy PublicPublic Sub DoBusy(Optional Caption As String)
Raises DoEvents(), the Progress event, or shows the busy dialog box depending on Options.

Count PublicPublic Property Get Count() As Long
Total count of files and folders.

Options PublicPublic Property Get Options() As FileListConstants
Retuns/sets the options for the file list, in binary flags (or/and allowed). Cannot set conFileListBusyDialogBox if modeless forms are not allowed.
